alert.note: Alert for Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 6:45PM CST until January 03 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CST FOR NORTHERN NESHOBA COUNTY... At 645 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pearl River, or near Edinburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Philadelphia around 650 PM CST. Burnside around 705 PM CST. Stallo around 710 PM CST. Nanih Waiya around 720 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
